short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to minimize DMs in Discord

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If the window containing Discord's messages in resized to a small enough size, the site becomes virtually unusable. This aims to fix that by allowing collapsing of the DM tab, freeing space for the chat section.
